documents.document: Roll up the rim season, here we go🙌🎉
It gets easier, but the pain never goes away https://t.co/VV2PC582Rt
I didn't want to order a large pizza, Mother Nature wanted me to...
I wonder if my sister knows that people only go see her now because she has a puppy https://t.co/i2C80sXRz1
I will also never understand the need to put mayo on both buns.... ONE IS ENOUGH.
Why is it so hard for people to understand "no mayo" 😩
I'm still confused on why Derek Shepherd had to die??
@cp_johnston it's a healthy obsession, I promise!
Yet again, Dr. Wong saved me and my precious jewels
I broke my tooth eating a salad today and my first thought was "pizza wouldn't treat me like this"
@justi_n_e it's always going to work... even if there are no donuts😭
When you really need to see me, this is the way to do it. @justi_n_e https://t.co/CSGwbo7C6L
When all you want to do is lay on the couch, watch Greys Anatomy and cry
I'm shining like fireworks over your small empty town
Self doubt is a dangerous thing
Not going to lie about it, didn't brush my teeth last night, so this morning my toothpaste went from mint flavour to tequila flavour
You would think it was my first time shaving if you saw my legs right now😂
HANK SEDIN!!!💚💙 #weareallcanucks
My Gma just asked if my glasses were new and prescriptions... I've only been wearing glasses for 9 years
Me: Skin, why do you gotta do this before my staff party? Skin: Because I hate you.
BC HAS NEW LICENSE PLATES THAT HAVE BEARS ON THEM!!!!! TAKE ALL MY MONEY RIGHT NOW.
This morning I'm thankful that there are couches at work for me to nap on😴
Can't wait to watch a Dogs Purpose in theatres and sob uncontrollably right @RachelNCC ?
When you pick up @RachelNCC at 1am and she asks "why are you in a robe and pyjamas?" Uhh... did you want me to pick you up in a ball gown?
I forgot I had already brushed and flossed and now I'm two cookies in and can't stop
New music feels🙃 @SamHuntMusic https://t.co/yxfvVx4JYU
Some birds had a field day on my car today and I'll pay someone to scrub it off and also the road salt...
Got a serious case of the Mondaze 😴
"And I miss the way you make me feel" Oh, @edsheeran I love you. https://t.co/5cOwTuLj4W
I thought I was starting off my New Year with a nice walk and ocean view... nope it wasn't that. It was a god damn hike 😩
Driving the Sea to Sky highway on a day like this, absolutely breathtaking. My favourite drive💜
I've been trying to get out of bed for about an hour now, and it's not that I can't, it's just, I don't want too.
@RachelNCC the fact that you scrolled through to find this means we really do need a life
@MattyBShow Hope you have a great time with your family!!!! Have fun xo :)
My aunt got me a mood ring for Christmas and I can't wait to wear it and watch my mood fluctuate every 10 minutes
One Christmas dinner complete. Probably won't cook another for awhile because I'm exhausted and want to crawl into my bed and sleep forever😩
I'm over here just trying to keep traditions going since this year my family has forgotten what that means
I was VERY disappointed and almost offended so I said I would make it. I'VE NEVER MADE IT. I DON'T EVEN THINK I'VE WATCHED SOMEONE MAKE IT.
I think my family has forgotten how we celebrate Christmas.. no one was going to make Tourtière... have they lost their damn minds???
Just realizing now that I forgot my favourite necklace in the forever 21 change room😩😩😩
Bath and body works wants all my money🙈
Life update: 15 days behind on my advent calendar.. well actually both advent calendars. So I'm 30 days behind.
When your sister says your favourite thing to hear "Order a pizza and I'll pay for it" 🎉🙌
I went through all my make up and now I just want more. Well, it's more of a need not a want.
When the Canucks score 6 goals and STILL lose😭😭😭
Honestly peeing after being in traffic for 3 hours is the most glorious thing
I'm already exhausted so sitting in traffic for 3 hours has made me feel things I've never felt
If moving isn't already bad enough, she wants me to move into a house that was probably used in the original Exorcism movies.
My sister sent me a link to a basement suite, and I genuinely thought she was joking about it. It looks like a place you go to get murdered.
I had to go through my Nike archives to find a pair that weren't knit or cloth so my feet don't get soaked in all this snow
I don't know how my cat has a bladder infection considering he pees on everything all the time
Was really relying on today being a snow day... didn't work out for me, at all.
You get to be the last person they see before they go, or the first person you see when they come back😊
There's something special about driving/picking someone up from the airport, especially during the holiday season✈️
My sister tagged me in this.... why don't you just tell me how you really feel? https://t.co/iuEMDXFAnB
Two thoughts are going through my head while I sit in my office that has no heat: 1. I should have never left my bed 2. I should go home
Thank god for Shemar and heated seats🔥🙌
If I was driving my Honda Civic I would still be in my driveway defrosting my car because George didn't know what heat was...
Someone: "how's life going?" Me(crying): "I'm 5 days behind on my advent calendar" that's how life is going.
Mother Nature made me eat 10 chocolate Timbits
I went to a 50th birthday party last night and today I feel like I'm the one who turned 50😩
HOW IN THE FRICKEN FRACK DO YOU HAVE NO HOT CHOCOLATE IN THE STORE??? WHY DO YOU HAVE TO HURT ME LIKE THIS??? 💔
Fortunately, today I showered before I left the house. You're welcome.
When I say I rolled out of bed, I literally mean I rolled off the mattress, stood up, put clothes on, brushed my teeth and left...
It's been the kind of Monday where I'm contemplating making a chocolate cake at 10:30pm
Hearing one of my best friends on the radio for her first shift brings tears to my eyes. We have come so far, look at you go❤️❤️
Really can't describe how shitty today was😒 If only I could sleep for the next 6,284,828 hours
My brother is smart, he moved provinces so he doesn't have to help family move, ever.
I just help move for the free pizza.. the only thing worth it
People will continue to ask me to help them move, and I will continue to say yes, but just know that I HATE moving.
Picking up my sister and her drunk friends in Gastown < not picking up my sister and her drunk friends in Gastown
This documentary is really depressing me. The title, Too Young To Die is very accurate.
When Heath Ledger won the oscar for the Joker and his family accepted it in his honour, my heart💔😭
They're showing clips of Brokeback Mountain and now I'm grabbing my DVD off the shelf because it's one of my favourites😭😭😭
I'm just going to watch all the Heath Ledger movies and cry to myself
I'm watching a documentary on Heath Ledger & I love him even more. Might have to watch Brokeback Mountain and then The Dark Knight in honour
I found someone worse at bowling than me... her name is @RachelNCC.
The amount of gutter balls I've bowled tonight is embarrassing. Clearly my time spent working here did nothing for my game😩
Why does The Notebook get to me every time??? Every. Single. DAMN. Time.
If this isn't the perfect excuse to go to bed at 8:15pm on a Friday night, I don't know what is. #whatdoyoudowithoutwifi
I can't tell if the upstairs tenants are having a really heated argument or if they're just having a regular conversation in Korean...
My Wi-Fi isn't working so I'm actually going to have to get off the couch and manually choose a DVD to watch. Unacceptable, it's almost 2017
The good thing about being at work past 6 is that there was no traffic on my way home AND I had 2 hours of no one interrupting me☺️
@RachelNCC reminded me about our DIY crafts that we've tried to accomplish in the past. It didn't go very well. It never turns out right😂😂😂
Accurate. The answer is almost always pizza. https://t.co/uW9qi3a10i
My sister thought it was a good idea to go out for Indian food without me...This is probably the worst decision she's ever made.
If I just eat peanut butter filled pretzels all night, does that count as having dinner?
I genuinely feel bad for all those allergic to peanuts. A little(very little) piece of my heart breaks because you can't taste heaven
I'm not mad that I went grocery shopping yesterday and then tonight I came home to pizza because my sister is a lazy piece of poo
Now looks like I have bright pink, kind of chapped lips
When you don't want to play your rec vball game with a full face of make-up so you scrub off your liquid lipstick only making things worse
@justi_n_e when they butcher your bff's intro.... https://t.co/48mZ3V74Ql
I almost fought a man in the Walmart parking lot but instead of letting my anger take control of me, I just sat in my car and yelled at him
Someone actually texted me this morning at 2am and asked if I was awake. They clearly don't know me very well. 2am and still awake? YA RIGHT
@bklyndrdgr I have a younger sister who I like to think is my maid sometimes😂
I need better friends... like friends who will offer to come clean my bedroom and do my laundry.
I feel like the only appropriate thing to do on my last day of vacation is to literally not leave my bed till tomorrow morning.
@bklyndrdgr @cp_johnston okay but she's making it seem like I was sitting out there watching her like a creep...I wasn't! I was just waiting
@cp_johnston oh... the fries didn't cheer you up?
@cp_johnston I didn't want you to feel rushed and I was just saving some gas...
